description: FastQC report of input FASTQ file
A hdf5 file containing transcript by sample matrices of TPM and number of reads
JSON file reporting number of fragments with at least one compatible mapping, as well as the number that didn't
TSV file reporting name, length, effective length, TPM, and numReads for each transcript
JSON file recording main command line parameters used by salmon to produce these data
TSV file reporting numbers of uniquely mapped and ambiguous reads for each transcript
Gzipped binary file containing approximation of observed fragment length distributions
JSON file with statistics about the run, e.g. number of fragments observed/mapped
